Acidic Sphere
  • Spellcasting Implement +10Spellcasting Implement +10: Passive: +10 Implement bonus to Universal Spell Power.
  • +4 Orb Bonus+4 Orb Bonus: While this orb is equipped and you are actively blocking, you gain a +4 orb bonus to all saving throws, as well as Acid, Cold, Fire, Electric, and Sonic resistances.
  • Corrosion +77Corrosion +77: Passive: +77 Equipment bonus to Acid Spell Power.
  • Mystic Diversion +9% Mystic Diversion +9%: +9 Enhancement bonus to decreased threat generated from spell damage.
  • Insightful Mystic Diversion +4%Insightful Mystic Diversion +4%: +4 Insight bonus to decreased threat generated from spell damage.

Blazing Sun
  • +4 Orb Bonus+4 Orb Bonus: While this orb is equipped and you are actively blocking, you gain a +4 orb bonus to all saving throws, as well as Acid, Cold, Fire, Electric, and Sonic resistances.
  • Insightful Sheltering +1Insightful Sheltering +1: +1 Insight bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings
  • Radiance +90Radiance +90: Passive: +90 Equipment bonus to Light and Alignment Spell Power.
  • Devotion +90Devotion +90: Passive: +90 Equipment bonus to Positive (Healing) Spell Power.

Coalesced Coinage
  • +3 Orb Bonus+3 Orb Bonus: While this orb is equipped and you are actively blocking, you gain a +3 orb bonus to all saving throws, as well as Acid, Cold, Fire, Electric, and Sonic resistances.
  • Charisma +4 Charisma +4: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • Insightful Alluring Skills Bonus +4Insightful Alluring Skills Bonus: +4 Insight bonus to Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle, Intimidate, and Perform.
  • Insightful Radiance +31Insightful Radiance +31: Passive: +31 Insight bonus to Light and Alignment Spell Power.
  • Insightful Radiance Lore +7%Insightful Radiance Lore +7: Passive: Your Light and Aligned spells gain a 7% Insight bonus to their chance to critical hit.

Concentrated Chaos
  • +5 Orb Bonus+5 Orb Bonus: While this orb is equipped and you are actively blocking, you gain a +5 orb bonus to all saving throws, as well as Acid, Cold, Fire, Electric, and Sonic resistances.
  • Nearly FinishedNearly Finished: This item isn't quite finished, but it's only a step away from completion. Bring it to a Cannith Reforging Station and combine it with melted materials to restore this item to its full potential.
    • Quality Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma +1Quality Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma +1: This item grants a +1 quality bonus to any one of the 3 mind related ability statistics: intelligence (INT), wisdom (WIS), or charisma (CHA).
  • Insightful Enchantment Focus +2Insightful Enchantment Focus +2: +2 Insight bonus to the DC of Enchantment spells.
  • Insightful Necromancy Focus +2Insightful Necromancy Focus +2: +2 Insight bonus to the DC of Necromancy spells.
  • Chaos Absorption 17%Chaos Absorption 17%: Passive: 17% Enhancement Bonus to Chaos Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)

  • Spellcasting Implement +14Spellcasting Implement +14: Passive: +14 Implement bonus to Universal Spell Power.

  • Void Lore +13%Void Lore +13: Passive: Your Negative Energy and Poison spells gain a 13% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Necromancy Focus +3 Necromancy Focus +3: +3 Equipment bonus to the DC of Necromancy spells.
  • Profane Negative Amplification +29Negative Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming negative energy healing by +29 (Profane bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
